name: Bamazon
description: First build a database called Bamazon, and a table named products.   Products has id auto_increment, product_name, department name, price(cust), stock    Script behavior: 		1- Display all products. 			2- Prompt user for product they want to buy. 			3- Prompt user for quantity 			4- Confirm prompt to buy 				5- Check to see if there in sufficient quantity 				6- Decrement quantity.
